sentences.english: Moreover, 10 burials from Majabang Culture were yielded.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还清理了10座马家浜文化时期的墓葬。

sentences.english: The stone tomb-door is an important part of tombs.
sentences.chinese: 石墓门是墓葬的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The tombs from the late Warring States period to Qin dynasty are the main content of the dissertation.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要讨论江陵地区战国晚期至秦代的墓葬资料。

sentences.english: Ancient tombs and memorials for whales and dolphins can be found across the country.
sentences.chinese: 古代鲸鱼和海豚的墓葬和纪念品在全国各地都有发现。

sentences.english: It was used as burial ground for monks of temple after cremation .
sentences.chinese: 是寺僧圆寂火化后灵骨的墓葬地。

sentences.english: Well a new share this is really freak, tombs for freya chronicle.
sentences.chinese: 那么新购这真是怪胎，墓葬为芙蕾雅编年史。

sentences.english: Look at Jesus Christ's sake, don't dig tombs here.
sentences.chinese: 看在耶稣基督的分上，莫要挖掘这里的墓葬。

sentences.english: Please avoid parking in front of an open interment site unless you are part of a funeral procession.
sentences.chinese: 请避免将车停在前边的一处墓葬园，除非您是送葬。

sentences.english: This thesis takes tombs of Sui and Tang Dynasty in north China as studying objects.
sentences.chinese: 本文以北方地区隋唐墓葬为研究对象。

sentences.english: Some burials were excavated at the Baotaping site, Fengjie County in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 2003年在奉节县宝塔坪遗址发掘一批墓葬。
中国明朝皇帝的墓葬群。

sentences.english: The Northern Dynasties tomb with murals at Wanzhang in Cixian county, Hebei province, contains the burial of a prominent personage.
sentences.chinese: 河北磁县湾漳北朝壁画墓是一座规格很高的墓葬。

sentences.english: There is an inclined passage in the east of tomb.
sentences.chinese: 墓葬东壁还有一条斜坡墓道。

sentences.english: On the contrary, the ancient tombs also plays a novel mapping function.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，古小说又对墓葬起着映射功能。

sentences.english: The immortal capable of flight is a typical imagination in the art of Han dynasty funeral.
sentences.chinese: 在汉代墓葬艺术中，羽人是一种较为典型的艺术形象。

sentences.english: A Large number of stone-constructed tombs of the Shang and Zhou dynasties have been discoveved in tile northeast and southeast China.
sentences.chinese: 中国是世界范围内古代石构墓葬的一个重要分布区域。

definition: to dig up/to appear in an excavation/unearthed/to come up out of the ground
funerary objects (items buried together with the dead)
path leading to a grave/tomb passage/aisle leading to the coffin chamber of an ancient tomb
